name: Escape From RewindLand!
description:
Do you enjoy 2D Platformers? Do you enjoy some story? Then dont worry! This game has it all! Spikes, lava, moving platforms! This game is packed with challenging and fun levels! An awesome concept where you can rewind time with a little twist of story in it!  

Story:

It was a fine day where you were just walking around near your house when suddenly, a mysterious portal appeared! You decided to inspect it and accedently entered it!Now it is upon you, the player, to save him! 

Credits:

Game made by Kridox(me)

Sound effects created using BFXR

Music created using ChromeMusicLab

Game design made by Kridox(me)

Thank you!
